Acknowledgements
================

The Dulcinea developer team would like to thank everybody who
contributed in any way, with code, hints, bug reports, ideas, moral
support, endorsement, or even complaints.  Listed in alphabetical
order:

Anton Benard
David Binger
A.M. Kuchling    
Roger Masse
Neil Schemenauer
Greg Ward

Other contributors:
Oleg Broytmann
Michael Davidson
Mario Ruggier
